system.requirements: Tier 3; 2+ Cybernetics, Tech-Use +10, Cybernetic Boost. Aptitudes: Intelligence, Tech
system.effect: All Character's Cybernetics count as being one level of Craftsmanship Higher than that of their Base Craftsmanship (Poor-->Common-->Good-->Best)

description.value: All Character's Cybernetics count as being one level of Craftsmanship Higher than that of their Base Craftsmanship (Poor-->Common-->Good-->Best)
